definitions: a discharge of a worker or workers because of economic conditions or shortage of work

examples.text: the workforce is on strike over layoffs
the most recent layoff saw staff fall to 175 from 250

shortDefinitions: temporary or permanent discharge of worker or workers

definitions: a period during which someone does not take part in a customary sport or other activity

examples.text: they needed to rehabilitate injuries or just brush up after long layoffs

shortDefinitions: period during which someone is unable to take part in sport
